globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://maps.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.azure.com https://*.azurewebsites.net https://maps.googleapis.com
